entry.title: Hello Jekyll
entry.content:
Well, here's my hello world blog post. This is utilizing Jekyll which is pretty simple/neat. For me anything simple is a plus as I become really tired of jumping through tons of hoops and dealing with complex or over-architected things all the time.

Jekyll feels like a good mix of a no database blog/CMS where I can sling some markdown and get a blog up and rolling easily. This will be one platform for me coming out of my hermit hole and to hopefully give back to the software community.

I have taken from it for far too long and I have experiences as well as my opinion to share. I hope to leave some gems behind for the software community.
